OrgName: Wyndham Worldwide Corporation, and its subsidiary Wyndham Worldwide Operations, Inc.
activities:
We process personal information relating to our customers, employees, and applicants located in the European Union or Switzerland. We process customer information in order to provide them with our products and services, facilitate our business operations and in connection with meeting our legal and regulatory compliance obligations.  We process employee and applicant information to fulfill employment-related functions and comply with our legal, business and contractual obligations.  Our Safe Harbor Employee and Applicant Notice is available on WWC’s Intranet and applicant website.  
Privacy Notice Effective: 1/31/2014
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President and Corporate Compliance Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal Data Covered: Our Safe Harbor Privacy Notices cover all customer, employee and applicant data (off-line, on-line, manual process, etc.)
recoursemech: We have designated the American Arbitration Association (AAA) as our independent recourse mechanism.
